lead_paragraph: Captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni is glad India will play three Twenty20 matches in Australia and hopes it will help the team identify the right combination before the World Twenty20 at home in March.

headline.print_headline: Australia T20s Chance to Test Combination, Says India's Dhoni
headline.main: Australia T20s Chance to Test Combination, Says India's Dhoni

snippet: Captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni is glad India will play three Twenty20 matches in Australia and hopes it will help the team identify the right combination before the World Twenty20 at home in March....
